channel.title: [HelpMe] Please Read! Error on runMoparScape batch
channel.description:
Hi all who read this... I have a question! When I run runMoparScape batch file, This is what shows up: ' java ' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch program. Press any key to continue . . .
And if you right click it and click on edit, this is what it says
@echo off title Running Bot java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar;./HybridScape; Bot 0 ::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem pause
What do we change that to to make it work?

item.title: [HelpMe] Please Read! Error on runMoparScape batch
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

take it to mopar’s help section. This is for server development help only.

Read full topic
item.source: [HelpMe] Please Read! Error on runMoparScape batch

item.title: [HelpMe] Please Read! Error on runMoparScape batch
item.dc:creator: @rubydragonxd rubydragonxd
item.description:
@rubydragonxd wrote:

Hi all who read this… I have a question! When I run runMoparScape batch file, This is what shows up:
’ java ’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch program.
Press any key to continue . . .

And if you right click it and click on edit, this is what it says

@echo off
title Running Bot
java -noverify -Xmx500m -cp .;./MoparScape.jar;./HybridScape; Bot 0
::param 0 for highmem, 1 for lowmem
pause

What do we change that to to make it work?

Read full topic
